name: Buttermilk Pecan Chicken
author: Annita Layton

ingredients.name: to 3 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts

instructions: Place butter in large shallow roasting pan in oven until melted. Remove and set aside. Mix buttermilk and egg; set aside. Combine flour, pecans, paprika, salt and pepper in medium bowl. Coat chicken in buttermilk mixture, then in flour mixture. Place in roasting pan, turn to coat with butter. Bake at 375Â° about 45 minutes to 1 hour until chicken is a deep golden brown.
